ingredients.item: 2 medium Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Eggs
1 can Dr Oetker Pretty Pink Cupcake Icing
1 can Dr Oekter Vanilla Flavour Cupcake Icing

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 190°C, gas mark 5. Line a 12-hole cake tin with 12 paper cases.
Whisk the Flora Buttery with the sugar until pale and fluffy. Whisk in the eggs, one at a time until combined. Fold in the flour and spoon into the paper cases.
Bake for 15-18 minutes until golden and a skewer comes out clean. Allow to cool on a rack.
Using a star nozzle, follow the instructions on the icing can to decorate the cakes, making 6 pink and 6 vanilla. Top each with a wafer daisy.
